Detailed Description

Class modifying the parameter xml file.

For the moment this class only adds the cluster user information (in the units section).

Author:
Lynn Hazan

Member Function Documentation

Opens and parses the file with the url.

Returns:

Writes the modified xml tree to a parameter file given by url.

Parameters:
url url of the file to write to.
Returns:

QDomNode ParameterXmlModifier::findDirectChild ( QString  childName  ) 

Finds the first child node with the tag name childName direct child of the root node.

Parameters:
childName name of the child node tag to look up.
Returns:
the first node starting from root having tagName as tag name.

Finds the first child node with the tag name childName direct child of the ancestor node.

Returns:

QDomNode ParameterXmlModifier::findDirectChild ( QString  childName,
QString  grandChildName,
QString  value,
QDomNode  ancestor 
)

Finds the first child node with the tag name childName direct child of the ancestor node.

This node has to contain a direct child node with the tag name grandChildName with a text value of value.

Parameters:
childName name of the child node tag to look up.
grandChildName name of the grandchild node tag to look up.
value value of the textNode contained in grandChildName.
ancestor starting node from which to look up for the child node.
Returns:
the first child node corresponding to the criteria.

bool ParameterXmlModifier::setClusterUserInformation ( int  pGroup,
QMap< int, ClusterUserInformation > &  clusterUserInformationMap 
)

Sets the map of cluster user information.

Parameters:
pGroup the electrod group id for which the cluster user information have to be retrieved (corresponds to the currently opened cluster file).
clusterUserInformationMap map given the cluster user information, the key is the cluster id and the value an instance of ClusterUserInformation.
Returns:
true if the modification succeded, false otherwise.
